verbose_text: Bcl-2 was overexpressed, whereas the pro apoptotic molecule Bax was downregulated in hTERT high CSCs (XREF_FIG G), suggesting that hTERT blocks chemotherapy induced apoptosis in breast CSCs by preferential activation of the Bcl-2 cell survival response.
evidence: Bcl-2 was overexpressed, whereas the pro-apoptotic molecule Bax was downregulated in hTERT high  CSCs ( XREF_FIG G), suggesting that hTERT blocks chemotherapy-induced apoptosis
